[[Shukaku]] pounds on its stomach with its arm, producing a loud sound. The external pressure from the pound forces a ball of [[wind]] from Shukaku's large mouth, firing it like a bullet. The wind, highly compressed and imbued with [[chakra]], travels in a straight line. It moves quickly across the landscape, tearing up trees and hollowing out the ground. When it finally impacts with its target, it explodes,<ref name="d2"/> dealing enough damage that even [[Gamabunta]] couldn't withstand more than a few. By hitting its stomach rapidly, Shukaku can produce multiple Air Bullets in order to overwhelm opponents.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 135</ref>
